title: Sony XM5 retail packaging confirms less battery life than originally thought and Google Assistant
content:
Last week we saw leaked official-looking images that showed off the sleek new design of the upcoming Sony XM5s, along with information suggesting that the battery life of these new headphones would reach 40 hours. Even newer leaks of retail packaging suggest otherwise.

moreâ€¦

The post Sony XM5 retail packaging confirms less battery life than originally thought and Google Assistant appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: It looks like the Sony XM5s will get a smaller battery than we thought, according to newly leaked retail packaging.
